meanings.sent1: The leatherleafs were carefully collected for a school project.
meanings.sent2: I love the way the leatherleafs rustle in the wind.
meanings.sent3: The leatherleafs decided to have a party and invited all the other leaves.
meanings.sent4: The leatherleafs formed a protective shield around the delicate flowers.
meanings.sent5: The leatherleafs added a touch of elegance to the bouquet.

meanings.definition: Leatherleafs: the leaves of a leatherleaf plant
meanings.sent1: The leatherleafs on the ground provided a soft cushion for the forest creatures.
meanings.sent2: The leatherleafs glistened with dew in the early morning light.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel used the leatherleafs as a disguise during hide-and-seek.
meanings.sent4: The leatherleafs danced gracefully in the breeze, like nature's ballerinas.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant green of the leatherleafs stood out against the brown forest floor.
